note:
An appetiser of my blacklist: sanctimonious nationalists, ideology vendors, so-called "patriots", religious bigots, and of course, beetroot. Let's not forget sports talk, car obsessives, celebrities and spotlight seekers (and the so-called British 'royals'), politicians, advertising, Apple junk, and Ted Talks.

A few redeeming charms: I'm an animator. Voracious reader. Military history and Aegean Bronze Age enthusiast. And science is always on my menu.

Popularity contests? Nah. Not interested.
